text: Neolepetopsis is a genus of sea snails, the true limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Neolepetopsidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Neolepetopsis include: * Neolepetopsis densata McLean, 1990 * Neolepetopsis gordensis McLean, 1990 * Neolepetopsis nicolasensis McLean, 2008 * Neolepetopsis occulta McLean, 1990 * Neolepetopsis verruca McLean, 1990 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neolepetopsidae
title: Neolepetopsis
